title: Me vs you (also know as Felixou’s author page)
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:penumbra-bhl]]

[[module CSS]]


:root {
    --header-title: "FELIXOU's";
    --header-subtitle: "Author Page";

#page-title{display:none}

}

/* ----------*/

.tcontainer {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: flex-start;
    align-content: space-between;
}

.caser {
    background-color: #413e3e;
    width: 14.2rem;
    padding: 6px;
    margin: 6px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: solid 1px #808080;
    display: block;
    text-align: center;
    transition: transform .16s;
    line-height: 1.1;
    position: relative;
}

.caser hr {
    margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0;
}

.caser h4 {
    margin-top: 14px;
    margin-bottom: -12px;
}

.caser img.image {
    max-height: 12rem;
    width: max-content;
    object-fit: cover;
    object-position: top;
}

.caser:hover {
    transform: scale(1.52);
    z-index: 2;
}
.caser:focus-within {
    transform: scale(1.52);
    z-index: 2;
}

.hoverdesc {
    position: absolute;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    background: grey;
    border: solid 1px #ccc;
    width: 14.2rem;
    top: 100%; left: 50%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    margin-top: -5rem;
    padding: 0.4rem;
    opacity: 0;
    font-size: 70%;
    pointer-events: none;
    transition: margin-top 0.3s cubic-bezier(.08,.72,.5,.94), opacity 0.175s linear;
    z-index: -1;
    word-break: unset;
}

.caser:hover .hoverdesc,
.caser .hoverdesc:hover {
    margin-top: 0;
    opacity: 1;
    pointer-events: all;
}
.caser:focus-within .hoverdesc{
    margin-top: 0;
    opacity: 1;
    pointer-events: all;
}

.anchor {
    position: sticky;
    height:0;
    top: 0;
}
.sidebox {
    margin-top: 16px;
    max-height: calc(92vh - 24px);
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    right: -14em;
    z-index: 4;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

div#toc {
     box-sizing: border-box;
     font-size: 90%;
     box-shadow: none;
     border: solid 1px #ccc;
}

@media (max-width: 1384px) {
    .sidebox {
        display: none;
        visibility:hidden;
 
    }
}

[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Well, hello there. I am Felix, also known as Felixou.
I am a French Canadian (also known as //Quebecois//) who enjoys the world of SCP and sometimes writes about it. My pronouns are he/him.

Anyways, welcome (or welcome back) to my author page. Below is a list of my work on the wiki. Idk what else to say.
[[/div]]

~~~~

------

[[=]]
++ __SCPs__
[[/=]]
[[div class="tcontainer"]]
 
[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/scp-6111/Memoriathumbnail.jpg link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6111"]]
++++* [[[SCP-6111]]]
Co-authored with [[*user ZG1906]]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]]//Approximately three days after the theft of SCP-6111, multiple D-Class were reported missing from their cells.//[[/span]]
[[/div]]
 
[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-6266/thumbnail.jpg link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6266"]]
++++* [[[SCP-6266]]]
Co-authored with [[*user roundabouts]]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]]//"I just wanted to see what would happen when someone affected by alcohol used SCP-6266"//.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-6388/OuterSpace.jpg link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6388"]]
++++* [[[SCP-6388]]]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]]//"So you killed it?"//
//"'Course I did. It surely didn't move after that."//[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-6822/Cromthumbnail.png link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6822"]]
++++* [[[SCP-6822]]]
Co-authored with [[*user Jack Waltz]]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]]//You feel like you're floating, like in those dreams you have every once in a while.//

//Your lungs are filled with the refreshing air, every last bit of it holding the taste of nature.//[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-7878/everything.png link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7878"]]
++++* [[[SCP-7878]]]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]]//Doing Everything, Everywhere, All At Once.//
[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4380/first.png link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4380"]]
++++* [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4380 SCP-001]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]]//1 + 1 = 1//
[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-7788/asphodel-white.png link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7788"]]
++++* [[[SCP-7788]]]
Co-authored with [[*user Jack Waltz]]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]]//The wheat moves once more and shines golden under the sun.//
[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-7453/deal.png link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7453"]]
++++* [[[SCP-7453]]]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]]//God, I am so sorry.//
[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-8111/rain.png link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8111"]]
++++* [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8111 SCP-8111 ]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]]//Maybe I've changed. Maybe I'm tired.//
[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-396/thumbnail.jpg link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-396"]]
++++* [[[SCP-396]]]
Rewrite of Anonymous and [[*user dr kondraki]]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]]//We want this thing fixed, do not try to avoid your duty just by containing it without much thought.//
[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-8566/existencethumb.png]]
++++* [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8566 SCP-8566 ]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]]//Please save us. No matter the cost.//
[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

------
[[=]]
++ __Tales & GoI Formats__
[[/=]]
[[div class="tcontainer"]]
 
[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/unexpected-light/unexpected.jpg link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/unexpected-light"]]
++++* [[[Unexpected Light]]]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]]//He thought of the sun, the big red monstrosity that broke the day, and was waiting to break **his** day//...[[/span]]
[[/div]]
 
[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/ninth-circle/Ninth.jpg link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/ninth-circle"]]
++++* [[[Ninth Circle]]]
Co-authored with [[*user Fish^12]]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]]//"What's 'Atypical Persuasion'?"// _
 _
//"… No idea."//[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/wilson-s-wildlife-adoption-gallery/adoption_center.png link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/wilson-s-wildlife-adoption-gallery"]]
++++* [[[Wilson's Wildlife Adoption Gallery]]]
Megacollab w [[*user AvocadoMilk]] , [[*user Liryn]], [[*user NebulousStar]], [[*user Ralliston]], [[*user Sirslash47]]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]]//Just a bunch of pets//[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/log-of-anomalous-dates/dates.png link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/log-of-anomalous-dates"]]
++++* [[[Log of Anomalous Dates]]]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]] //A skeleton will appear in Dr. Kalister's bedroom closet at night and scream "IT'S ALMOST HALLOWEEN!" before disappearing.// [[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/opusconfidant/opconf.png link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/opusconfidant-april-1st-2023-spotlight"]]
++++* [[[OpusConfidant April 1st 2023 Spotlight]]]
Megacollab w [[*user Prismal]], [[*user Uncle Nicolini]], [[*user EstrellaYoshte]], [[*user RadiantGold]], [[*user Ethagon]], [[*user syuzhet]], [[*user HarryBlank]], [[*user Fantem]]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]] //I did the PRIME entry// [[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/zeniths-are-for-those-who-deserve-them/zeniths.png link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/zeniths-are-for-those-who-deserve-them"]]
++++* [[[Zeniths Are For Those Who Deserve Them]]]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]] //It was meaningless, all of it.//
//But he knew it.// [[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-que13-126/blankpursuer.png link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-que13-126"]]
++++* [[[SCP-QUE13-126]]]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]] //Everyone outside alone is to remain aware of any sound of footsteps near them.// [[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

[[=]]

-----

++ __Other__

[[div class="tcontainer"]]
 
[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/felixoupage/felixou.jpg link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/felixoupage"]]
++++* [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/felixoupage Felixou's Author Page]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]]What? Who put this here?
[[size 80%]]//What? Who put this here?//[[/size]]
[[size 60%]]//What? Who put this here?//[[/size]]
[[size 40%]]//What? Who put this here?//[[/size]][[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/felixouartpage/error.png link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/felixouartpage"]]
++++* [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/felixouartpage Felixou's Thumbnails]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]]//Well, would you look at that. Even more cool thumbnails for articles!//[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="caser"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/reimagined-hub/Reimagined.png link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/reimagined-hub"]]
++++* [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/reimagined-hub Reimagined Hub]
[[span class="hoverdesc"]]//But what if something went differently? What if the anomaly now works differently? What if it's the same properties but a different anomaly?//[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]
@@ @@


[[module ListPages limit="1" order="random" created_by="Felixou"]]
[[div style="text-align: center;"]]
> //Random Article: **%%title_linked%%**//
[[/div]]
[[/module]]

||~ [[[scp-achievement-badges | Achievement]]] ||~ Description ||
||= Certificate Of Attendance || Post an Author Page, add to a Collaborative Log, and participate in an Official SCP Wiki Contest. ||
||= Draw Me Like One Of Your [REDACTED] || Create an artwork page with a rating of at least +30. ||
||= Participation Trophy || Write an article rated at least +100 ||
||= The Medium Is The Message || Author of at least 10 media files (images, audio, videos, etc.) that are used on the wiki. Must be original works released under a version CC-by-SA license compatible with the SCP Wiki. ||
||= Look Ma! I'm On TV! || Have one of your works be featured on an off-site video, podcast, video game, etc. ||
||= Level Up! || You've been a member of the SCP Wiki for one calendar year. ||
||= Thousandaire || Entered into any of the X000 contests (i.e. SCP-1000, SCP-2000, SCP-3000, etc.) ||
||= Secret Christmas Presents || Successfully participate in the official Annual Holiday Art Exchange, becoming someone's Secret Santa. ||

@@ @@

[[tab Serious stuff]]
If I go away for a long time (about a year on most SCP-related social media), I'll let all of my articles to the community. All co-authored articles go to their respective authors.
[[/tab]]
[[tab Other related pages]]

I'm also an author on the [http://fondationscp.wikidot.com/felixou SCP FR wiki]!

If you have any questions about any articles there, feel free to ask me on the comment section of this page or on Discord.
[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:listusers-1 users="."]]
[[div style="background-image: url(https://www.wikidot.com/avatar.php?userid=%%number%%); background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center center; background-size: auto 58%;"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/felixoupage/Gtfo.png]]
[[/div]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:listusers-2]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/felixoupage/Gtfo.png]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:listusers-3]]
Gtfo my author page bitch.

[[/=]]

//You look at him in defiance. He is ready to throw punches at you.//

//You say, with a smirk on your face, "Come at me, if you dare."//

//Felixou is now furious.//

//A voice comes out of nowhere; it screams.//

= "**{{READY?! ... FIGHT!!!!}}**"

//Some weird NES music starts playing, and it's pretty groovy.//

"I'm going to beat your ass!" //Felixou says out loud.//

//It's about to be a great battle. A fight between the titans. Some might even call it a war.//

[[=]]
> {{1 minute later...}}
[[/=]]

//Nevermind.//

//He fucking sucks at fighting.//

//You left his body in a sorry state.//

"P-Please," //Felixou says painfully.// "Please have mercy."

//You smile at him.//

//You approach his ear to whisper the final punchline.//


[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[collapsible show="+ Add your own punchline" hide="- Add your own punchline"]]
You can add punchline and final move by adding the following template. Make sure to remove the brackets.

@@= - - - - - - - - - - - -@@
@@> "(Your punchline here)"@@
@@> @@
@@> //[Your final move)//@@
@@> --[[*user (Your wikidot username)]]@@
@@= - - - - - - - - - - - -@@

It should do something like this:

> "Hasta la vista, baby."
>
> //Jumps on Felixou's head//
> --[[*user moto42]]

You can go nuts, but do not break any rule, pls.
(Starting and finishing at the horizontal lines below.)
[[/collapsible]]
[[/div]]

= - - - - - - - - - - - -
@@ @@

> "Mercy? You, of all people, dare ask for mercy? Even after everything you've done? Good grief, you surely are the lowest of the low..."
>  
> //Stomps on your skull a total of 179 times, crushing it.//
>
> ... and stay out...
> --[[*user DrGooday]]


= - - - - - - - - - - - -

> "Do you have any idea how hard it is to edit this page on mobile? You have no fucking idea."
>
> --[[*user Fish^12]]



= - - - - - - - - - - - -

> "Felixou? More like Felix you dead."
>
> //Shoots you a 1000 times, then tosses corpse into the ocean.//
> --[[*user Machen2]]


= - - - - - - - - - - - -

> "ok femur."
>
> //insert bass boosted vine boom sound effect here.//
> --[[*user winkwonkboi]]

= - - - - - - - - - - - -

> "Did you know that wiki-renowned author [[*user FELIXOU]] was once hit by a car?  Just something to consider."
>
> //runs over you in a Tesla Cybertruck//
> --[[*user KOTHARDARASTRIX]]

= - - - - - - - - - - - -

> "There is no mercy."
>
> //Begins microwaving the child Palpatine style//
> --[[*user Roufhous]]

= - - - - - - - - - - - -

> ##red|**FINISH HIM!**##
>
> "Wait what was the correct input again? Wait never mind I got it now!"
>
> //Plunges hand into your throat and proceeds to pull your spinal cord out and along with your head.//
>
> ##red|**Flawless Victory! Fatality!**##
>
> --[[*user Downtown Nowhere]]
= - - - - - - - - - - - -
> "Forbidden Technique: Seething Sphere, Crushing Crotch!"
>
> //Teleports behind you.//
>
> "Nothing personal kid..."
>
> --[[*user SphereFinale]]
= - - - - - - - - - - - -
> "I don't even know what I was doing here but, oh, well."
>
> //Casually pinch you to death.//
>
> --[[*user Seed Holt]]
= - - - - - - - - - - - -
> "You know what... you're right. Why are we even fighting? All this needless conflict, all the devastation it's caused, it's pointless."
>
> //I extend an arm, helping you up.//
>
> "Come on, let's put aside our differences and not bring any more chaos and fighting, but instead work to make the world better for everyone. Let's rebuild, together."
>
> //I outstretch my arms and embrace you, before plunging a knife deep into your back. You fall to the ground, looking up at me with bewilderment. I laugh.//
>
> "You really thought it would be that easy? You really thought I would let you survive? You fell right for it! You're even more foolish than I thought."
>
> //Your vision becomes fuzzy and cloudy as I walk away, leaving you to die. The last thing you see is me slowly walking as I trip over my own foot and fall on my face, ruining the dramatic exit scene I'd been building up to. Oh well.//
>
> --[[*user Rhineriver]]
= - - - - - - - - - - - -

> "A wise man once said, that violence for violence is the rule of beasts."
>  
> //I hold you above the ground by the neck.//
>
> "So tell me. Do you think beasts show mercy?"
>
> //You nervously shake your head. I smile in agreement, before launching you into stratosphere.//
>
> --[[*user Aftokrator]]

= - - - - - - - - - - - -
> "My kind have lived over countless centuries. I have seen universes collapse in on each other, and I have bathed in the blood of millions of innocents. I am the thirteenth of my kind. The thirteenth Cole indeed. I have not killed and lived for a century just to show your pitiful self ‘mercy’. Goodbye, Felixou. "
>

> --[[*user Cole 13]]
